price: We certainly know what the earth consumes of them [after their death], and with Us is a Preserved Record[2].
arabic: قَدۡ عَلِمۡنَا مَا تَنقُصُ ٱلۡأَرۡضُ مِنۡهُمۡۖ وَعِندَنَا كِتَٰبٌ حَفِيظُۢ
footnotes: [2] Or a Record that preserves everything.
